content:
path /v3/bcash/info
operationId BchGetBlockChainInfo
summary Get Bitcoin Cash Blockchain Information
description 5 credits per API callGet Bitcoin Cash Blockchain Information Obtain basic info like testnet / mainnet version of the chain current block number and its hash
responses
200
BchInfo
type object
properties
chain
type string
description Chain of the blockchain main or test
blocks
type number
description Last block
bestblockhash
type string
description Hash of the last block
difficulty
type number
description Difficulty of the PoW algorithm
description OK
